Question: How can I download the user guide?

Question: What changed in release 3.0?
Answer: In Release 3.0, Tosca delivers many of the features you asked for in our last customer survey for the Dashboard, Orders, Order History and Invoices. We have also made changes for a more consistent look & feel and improved speed and performance. Release Notes

Question: Is there a user guide for the Transplace feature?
Answer: Please refer to this guide for step by instructions: How to Track a Shipment

Question: What if I want to ship to another location that is not in the Ship To Location list?
Answer: You can add a location to use a single time by clicking the + button.  Please refer to this guide for step by instructions: How to add a location.pdf

Question: What constitutes a truck load?
Answer: This is the number of RPC items which will ,

Question: Can I add multiple RPC sizes to one order?
Answer: Yes. After you add the first item to the order, repeat the steps for each RPC size you want to order before you click the Submit button.

Question: Can I edit my orders after they are submitted?
Answer: This feature is not yet available in the Hub. To edit an existing order, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}.

Question: Can I place multiple orders simultaneously?
Answer: You can place multiple orders for a single location. After you add the first item to the order, repeat the steps for each RPC size you want to order before you click the Submit button. To place an order for another location, start a new order and select the location.

Question: Can I cancel my order?
Answer: Yes, you can now cancel your order from the order history pop-up, if it is in Unplanned status and the requested ship to date is greater than 7 days out.

Question: How many recurring orders can I place?
Answer: This feature is not available in the Hub. To submit recurring orders, use the Re-Order feature and create duplicate orders with new requested delivery dates.

Question: Can I edit recurring orders once placed?
Answer: This feature is not yet available in the Hub. To edit an existing order, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}.

Question: My orders are not reflecting in the History Table.
Answer: It may take 1-2 minutes for a new order to be processed. Once the order is processed, it will show up in the list. Click the Refresh button. If it does not appear, please make certain you have submitted the order and seen the confirmation message.  If the order is still not in the list, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: How can I track the shipping status of my order?
Answer: From the Dashboard or Order History, find our order, then look at the truck icon. If the icon is grey, it indicates that the order has not yet shipped. If the icon is orange and blue, it indicates the order has shipped and you can click the icon to open a popup view using Transplace.

Question: What is the truck icon?
Answer: The Tosca Hub provides an interface to Transplace so that you can track an order and see the shipping status.

Question: Is there more information about Transplace?
Answer: The Hub allows you to see a map of your shipment, the reference number and status of the order. Our partners at Transplace have many resources to assist you with understanding their other extensive offerings at this link: www.transplace.com/resources

Question: How do I contact Customer Experience?
Answer: There are Customer Experience contacts for each supply chain under Resources > Contact Customer Support

Question: How do I find my Customer Experience rep’s email address?
Answer: Click your Account menu at the top right of the screen. Your Customer Experience rep is listed with an email and phone number.

Question: How do I find my sales rep’s email address?
Answer: Click your Account menu at the top right of the screen. Your sales rep is listed with an email and phone number.

Question: How do I provide feedback?
Answer: Click the Resources drop down menu and select Feedback.

Question: My latest orders are not showing in My Recent Order History.
Answer: It may take 1-2 minutes for a new order to be processed. Once the order is processed, it will show up in the list. Go to the Order History page and click the Refresh button. If it does not appear, please make certain you have submitted the order and seen the confirmation message. If the order is still not in the list, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: When I click on Shipment icon, I do not see the status of my order.
Answer: Shipping status is available for orders that are being shipped by Tosca and the status is shipped. If your order has shipped and is not self-pickup and the status is not available, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: What are the various statuses on my order?
Answer:
Unplanned means your order is being reviewed and prepared.
Tendered means your order is planned and being worked on to secure carrier.
Tender Accept means your order is planned and carrier is assigned.
In-Transit means your order is shipped and can be tracked.
Delivered means your order is delivered.
Canceled means your order is canceled and will not be shipped.

Question: When I click on Transplace icon, I do not see the status of my order.
Answer: Shipping status is available for orders that are being shipped by Tosca and the status is shipped. If your order has shipped and is not self-pickup and the status is not available, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: Why is the Transplace icon grey?
Answer: Shipping status is only available for orders that are being shipped by Tosca and only once the order has been shipped.

Question: My outstanding invoice amount is different from the one on my records.
Answer: Due to processing delays, the amounts may differ until updated in all systems. We recommend you wait 3 days. If the amounts are still not as expected, please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: How do I download my invoices?
Answer: From the invoices page, there is an option to view and download invoices using Anytime Collect.

Question: I have more questions on my outstanding amount.
Answer: Please contact your Customer Experience rep by emailing {defaultCSRMail}

Question: How do I arrange to return RPCs to Tosca?
Answer: Returning containers to Tosca is easy. Use the Reporting menu and select Returns to let us know where to pick them up, how many and whether they have been stored inside or outside. Once you submit the request, we’ll take care of the rest.

Question: How do I let Tosca know where my RPC inventory has been shipped?
Answer: Reporting shipments is easy. Use the Reporting menu and select Transactions. Let us know where and when you sent the inventory, the quantity by size, and include the PO/BOL for each transaction.

Question: Where can I find a list of the approved shipping locations for Tosca?
Answer: You can find a list of all approved retailers and other receivers on our internet site: https://www.toscaltd.com/about-tosca/shipping-returns
